Articles.Content:
Hello hello, just bought the full version yesterday, been playing the free version only few days.. really liking the game, just what iv been missing in the games market =))

Haven landed on the mun, doing the nasa way of things.. testing testing testing hope docking comes soon.

Iv heard about this game on some occasion, but when i watched youtube videos by http://www.youtube.com/user/kurtjmac <<<--- this dude i decided to try the free version and then buy the full game =))

Cant wait for my first landing on the mun, woo \o/

Hi oskumo and welcome to the community

Good luck on your first Mun landing

Welcome oskumo to the forums.

And i love Kurtjmac videos to, They are fun to watch and if not can you "borrow" his designs to your own rocket.
kurtjmac was also the one that influenced me to purchase the game. lol
